Experts in wellbeing since 1985. | Experts in wellbeing since 1985, Aromatherapy Associates promotes the art of living well through mindful choices and an all-round healthy lifestyle. Founded by Geraldine Howard and Sue Beechey over 30 years ago with the vision to share the power of aromatherapy with the world, today Aromatherapy Associates mission remains unchanged. Now employing over 50 people and partnering with some of the leading hotels, resorts, spas & retail outlets in the world, Aromatherapy Associates believes in PURPOSE (always having meaning and intention in everything they do), BALANCE (helping find balance in mind, body skin), and WELLBEING (educating and providing the tools to living an all-round healthy lifestyle).
